info.title: Schema of AKS Fleet Resources events published to Azure Event Grid via Azure Resource Notifications
info.description: Describes the schema of the AKS Fleet Resources events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

ResourceNotificationsAKSResourcesFleetGa.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.AKSResources.FleetGateCreated event.
Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.AKSResources.FleetGateUpdated event.
Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.AKSResources.FleetGateDeleted event.

id.description: id of the resource for which the event is being emitted

name.description: name of the resource for which the event is being emitted

type.description: the type of the resource for which the event is being emitted

properties.description: properties in the payload of the resource for which the event is being emitted

additionalProperties.description: properties in the payload of the resource for which the event is being emitted

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource properties bag
